body.description: Delivering power when you need it the mighty max ML18-12 12 volt 18 Ah uses a state of the art heavy-duty calcium-alloy grid that provides exceptional performance and service life in both float and cyclic applications The ML18-12 is an absorbent glass mat (AGM) technology with a valve regulated design that can be used in enclosed and indoor environments without leaking or maintenance providing a superior performance for thousands of models Mighty max sla batteries are utilized in a wide variety of applications including consumer electronics electric vehicles engine starters golf carts hunting lawn and garden tools medical mobility motorcycles power sports portable tools solar toys and hobby access control devices emergency lighting security and more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good battery at a good price
reviews.reviewText: Replacement for an old battery. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The battery fit perfectly into my jump pack from Mac tools , works good multiple jumps and takes charge so it does its job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrong battery from a direct search
reviews.reviewText: I searched for a replacement battery for a Westinghouse WH7500SE portable generator and this battery was at the top of the list. The battery in the generator was too weak to start it and I needed the generator running. When the battery arrived and I went to install it I discovered it was not the correct battery for the generator but was considerably larger. There were no visible markings on the old battery while it was installed and I assumed (I know) I had ordered the correct battery. It turns out the original battery was 14 AH and the replacement is an 18 AH. I would return it but it is essential the generator be operational. So the new battery is being held in place by tie wraps because of it's size.I have to assume some responsibility here because I should have tried harder to ensure the battery I ordered was the correct one. I suppose my beef should be with the Amazon search engine for sending me to the wrong replacement battery. Anyway, the battery comes with new bolts for the cables which is a good thing because the original ones are larger. The construction is solid and it started the generator instantly. I'm not sure how long it will last though because the top edge is touching the generator housing. So, battery = good, search = bad, and me = not so great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars worked well for two seasons
reviews.reviewText: Replaced OEM battery that lasted over 10 years in equipment used infrequently. Fits perfectly, low cost, worked fine. Eventually I determined the charging system is defective and has been overcharging, so I can't tell how this would have lasted under normal conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my DR Field and Brush mower
reviews.reviewText: The battery died on my DR Field and Brush mower. This was a perfect replacement. It fit into the existing battery compartment/slot with no trouble, and the terminals attached easily. The mower started right up using the new battery, as expected. Eventually this one will die, and I'll replace it with the exact same thing since it has done so well.

reviews.reviewText: Great battery, shipped fast and good quality product. would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Working like a champ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Renewed My Old Jump Box for Less Than Half th Cost of a new one
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace the battery in my jump box that I keep with stand by generator. Even though generator has a built in battery, this insures that no matter what I can get it started. FYI, generator has an 11 HP engine which is almost impossible to start with the pull rope. This is the third Mighty Max battery I have bought over the years, not just for this jump box, but including my others For less than half the price of a new jump box, I can renew my existing to like new..

reviews.reviewTitle: Mighty Max Battery ML18-12 12V 18 AH High quality product
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a dead Briggs and Stratton 8k genny battery. Ordered online received in just a couple days and in good order. Opened the package, tested open voltage which was 12.9 volts after sitting on a cold step for a few hours. I was happy with that and load tested it and it passed with flying colours. Installed in genny and fired it right up. If you need a new small form factor battery from Mighty Max ML18-12 12V 18 AH the one I received could not be better. I mention the company so there is no confusion as to what I bought and from whom since Amazon seems to mix their reviews.
Awesome batteries. Fit my go go elite traveler scooter perfect. It was fully charged in less than 12 hours.
